content.question: The United States devised the Open Door policy in 1899 in order to

choices.label: establish a United States colony in China
encourage the Chinese to adopt Western culture
protect United States economic interests in China
prevent European nations from establishing a presence in Chinese territory
assure the right of the Unites States to intervene in China whenever necessary

content.answer: protect United States economic interests in China

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
